resources.string: "The Lord will watch over your coming and going both now and forevermore."\nPsalm 121:8
"So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my right hand."\nIsaiah 41:10
"I can do all things though Christ who strengthens me"\nPhilippians 4:13
